MemberSignature.Value: public static Android.Graphics.Bitmap CreateBitmap (int[] colors, int width, int height, Android.Graphics.Bitmap.Config config);
.method public static hidebysig class Android.Graphics.Bitmap CreateBitmap(int32[] colors, int32 width, int32 height, class Android.Graphics.Bitmap/Config config) cil managed

Docs.param: Array of used to initialize the pixels. This array must be at least as large as width * height.
The width of the bitmap
The height of the bitmap
The bitmap config to create. If the config does not support per-pixel alpha (e.g. RGB_565), then the alpha bytes in the colors[] will be ignored (assumed to be FF)
Docs.summary: Returns a immutable bitmap with the specified width and height, with each pixel value set to the corresponding value in the colors array.
Docs.exception: if the width or height are <= 0, or if the color array's length is less than the number of pixels.

The y coordinate of the first pixel in source
The number of pixels in each row
The number of rows
Docs.summary: Returns an immutable bitmap from the specified subset of the source bitmap.
Docs.exception: if the x, y, width, height values are outside of the dimensions of the source bitmap, or width is <= 0, or height is <= 0

Docs.param: The bitmap we are subsetting
The x coordinate of the first pixel in source
The y coordinate of the first pixel in source
The number of pixels in each row
The number of rows
Optional matrix to be applied to the pixels
true if the source should be filtered. Only applies if the matrix contains more than just translation.
Docs.summary: Returns an immutable bitmap from subset of the source bitmap, transformed by the optional matrix.
Docs.exception: if the x, y, width, height values are outside of the dimensions of the source bitmap, or width is <= 0, or height is <= 0
